00020 #include "AtomicInteger.h"
00021 #include "Logger.h"
00022 #include "Mutex.h"
00023 using namespace com::xuggle::ferry;
00024 
00025 VS_LOG_SETUP(VS_CPP_PACKAGE);
00026 
00027 int
00028 main(int, const char **)
00029 {
00030   int retval = 0;
00031   AtomicInteger ai;
00032   Mutex* mutex=0;
00033 
00034   for (unsigned int i = 0; i < 10; i++)
00035   {
00036     int val = ai.getAndIncrement();
00037     VS_LOG_DEBUG("Atomic Integer value: %d", val);
00038   }
00039   VS_LOG_DEBUG("Final Atomic Integer value: %d", ai.get());
00040 
00041   mutex = Mutex::make();
00042   if (mutex) {
00043     mutex->release();
00044     mutex = 0;
00045     VS_LOG_ERROR("Got a mutex value, but we're not in Java so null should be returned");
00046   } else {
00047     VS_LOG_INFO("got no mutex as expected");
00048   }
00049   VS_ASSERT(true, "this should never fail");
00050   return retval;
00051 }
